text:
Clove Lakes Park: A view of Clove Lake (once known as Britton's Pond) after the heavy rain storm of September 6, 1926 which destroyed the dams. This is a set of three views taken the same day.

September 1926.

By Wm. T. Davis through P. L. Sperr.
